预兆-亡灵: 轻微的颤栗，仿佛有手指沿着你的脊背滑下 Subtle shiver, like a finger down your spine
鼻孔对尘土和尸臭的气味皱起 Nostrils wrinkle at dusty, charnel odors
来源不明的哀悼般悲鸣 Dirge-like keening of uncertain providence
腐肉甲虫，在脚下嘎吱作响并匆匆爬行 Carrion Beetles, crunching and scurrying underfoot
令人不安的寂静，逐渐变得几乎震耳欲聋 Disturbing lack of Sound, growing almost Deafening
压抑的寒意，令人毛骨悚然，起鸡皮疙瘩 Oppressive Cold, Horripilation and Gooseflesh
用古老语言低语，提及早已被遗忘的名字 Whispers in an ancient Tongue, Names long Forgotten
被虫蛀的裹尸布碎片，古老的编织物 Strips of motheaten Shroud Linen, ancient Weave
下颌骨，牙齿齐全，朝上翻转，不见头骨踪影 Jawbone, replete with Teeth, upturned no Skull in sight
干瘪生物：面容凝固在恐惧的狞笑中 Desiccated Creature: Face locked in a Rictus of Fright
亵渎性地玷污了神圣符号 Blasphemously defaced Holy Symbols
紧握某物的骷髅手 Skeletal Hand, still gripping tightly onto something
